about.title: Your Partner in Applied AI Innovation
about.content: GO AI empowers businesses with cutting-edge AI solutions that bridge the gap between data and decision-making. From advanced computer vision and natural language processing to real-time video analytics, our platform transforms visual and language data into actionable intelligenceâ€”helping you automate processes, enhance safety, and unlock new efficiencies.
about.tagline: We bring intelligence to your innovation.

robot.title: Our AI model applied in Robotic Vision
robot.content: Our model provides robotics with the ability to see and interpret their environment, enabling more autonomous, precise, and adaptable operations.
robot.tagline: Let us help to apply your imagination in real life!

solutions.title: Our AI Solutions in Action
solutions.subtitle: Discover how our cutting-edge AI technologies are transforming industries with real-world applications

ocr.title: AI-Powered OCR & Document Processing
ocr.description: Transform your document workflows with our advanced OCR technology. Extract, classify, and process documents with industry-leading accuracy across 50+ languages.
features: Real-time processing with cloud & edge deployment
Smart document classification and data validation

motion.title: Human Motion & Behavior Analysis
motion.description: Leverage real-time video analytics to track, classify, and understand human movement. Gain actionable insights into dynamic physical behaviors using advanced pose estimation.
features: Full-body motion tracking with precise pose estimation
Behavior classification (e.g., throwing, kicking, reaching, stepping)
Real-time visual feedback with motion trails and overlays
Supports dynamic activity recognition across various environments

rotation.title: AI-Powered Rotation Counter for Power Tools
rotation.description: Automate the detection and counting of power tool rotations using advanced video analysis and YOLOv8 object detection. Ensure accurate monitoring and performance tracking in real-time.
features: Precision rotation tracking with adjustable sensitivity
Real-time annotated video with live counter overlay
Smart delay control to prevent double-counting
Optimized for drills and other rotary equipment

video.title: Advanced Video Recognition & Analytics
video.description: Transform video streams into actionable intelligence. Our computer vision models detect, track, and analyze objects in real-time for security, quality control, and operational insights.
features: Custom model training for specific use cases

gauge.title: AI-Powered Gauge Measurement System
gauge.description: Automatically detect, read, and log analog gauge values such as pressure and torque from live video. Ensure accuracy and traceability with digital conversion and export features.
features: Multi-gauge detection (pressure, torque, drill rotation, etc.)
Precise needle-to-value conversion in real time
Visual verification with annotated video overlay
Timestamped data export to Excel with process traceability

custom.title: Tailored AI Video Analytics for Your Unique Needs
custom.description: Unlock the flexibility of AI vision with fully customizable video analytics solutions. Whether it's monitoring cake production, specialized industrial tasks, or niche processes, our system adapts to your unique requirements with precision and scalability.
features: Custom model development for domain-specific applications
Support for unique workflows such as food processing or niche manufacturing
Modular architecture to add or remove capabilities as needed
Scalable deployment for both cloud and on-prem environments

video.title: Video Intelligence & Analytics
video.description: Transform video into real-time operational insight.

image.title: Advanced Image AI
image.description: Drive decisions through AI-powered image processing.

ecosystem.title: Unified AI Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: One platform. All your AI model needs. Avoid tool fragmentation with a scalable, centralized ecosystem.

industry.title: Adaptable to Any Industry
industry.description: Our AI models are designed to fit your vertical: Manufacturing, Healthcare, Retail, Finance, and Logistics.

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Whether you're a startup or enterprise, our solutions grow with you. Cloud-native, edge AI, and hybrid models.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Impact
manufacturing.quote: "Reduced inspection time by 75% and achieved 99.2% accuracy in defect detection."

building.quote: "80% reduction in fatal injurie. The system detected high-risk behaviors like unprotected work at heights and equipment malfunctions in real time."
